events.name: Google Cloud Next Extended Da Nang 2019
events.description:
Google Cloud Next 2019 is a three-day global conference that brings together thousands of the brightest and most innovative thinkers in the world. Whether you are a CEO, a developer, or just someone who is passionate about learning solutions and ideas for the next generation of the cloud, Next 2019 provides thousands of demonstrations, boot camps, keynotes, conversations, and breakouts to choose from.

Google Cloud Next Extended Da Nang 2019 is an extended event of the Cloud Next and will be held at Grand Mercure Hotel on Sat, Jun 15, 2019. This year, besides the Cloud Next Extended we would like to introduce our new cloud community `Google Cloud Community Da Nang` and we're willing to connect with anyone who passionate about GCF.

Agenda:
13:00 - 13:30 CHECK-IN AND EXHIBITION
13:30 - 13:45 OPENING CEREMONY, GDG MIEN TRUNG 3 YEAR RECAP AND ANNOUNCE GOOGLE CLOUD COMMUNITY DA NANG
14:45 - 15:30 CLOUD-NATIVE JAVA ON GCP - NGUY·ªÑN TH√ÄNH ƒê·∫†T
15:30 - 16:15 DEEP LEARNING ATTENTION - DUY ANH
16:15 ‚Äì 17:00 APPLY MACHINE LEARNING IN RESEARCH AND REAL PROJECT WITH AUTOML - NGUY·ªÑN THANH LI√äM

events.name: Online Cloud Study Jams Vietnam 2019
events.description:
ONLINE CLOUD STUDY JAMS 2019 is a free course co-organized by GDG Cloud Hanoi, GDG Cloud Da Nang and GDG Cloud HCM to bring the basic knowledge of Google Cloud Platform technologies to everyone and they can use for personal development or career advancement.

This course will be a great opportunity for everyone to learn the latest knowledge about Cloud, Data, Machine Learning and AI on the Google Cloud Platform.

Participants will receive free access to online lessons at Qwiklabs (https://www.qwiklabs.com). You can choose any of the recommended courses: Machine Learning, AI, Kubernetes, IoT, ...

In addition, learners can continue to participate in other courses to find the Google Cloud badges.

There will be many attractive prizes for those who complete the course well.
